entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
